snippet: A new draft with the option of nonmilitary national service would maintain the size and quality of our volunteer force while improving it and saving the government money.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Thomas E Ricks calls for a revived draft, to include both males and females, with an option of nonmilitary national service; contends that such a draft would maintain the size and quality of the current volunteer force while improving it and saving the government money; notes that it would also reap benefits in the form of community service and public works projects.
lead_paragraph: A new draft with the option of nonmilitary national service would maintain the size and quality of our volunteer force while improving it and saving the government money.
